Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Hover Boots#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #an Ice Trap#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Stray Fairy#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.
